title: EasyChat
description: A robust, multi-language chat system with built-in profanity filtering and seamless cross-platform support and logging capabilities. The scalable, event-based chat solution, now available with easy integration and unparalleled versatility. UI Included.
longDescription:
Due to irresponsible client's behavior, the code is no longer available for purchase over patreon, until i find better way.
Now you can get the EasyChat server source code from Patreon and get source code support by subscribing to EasyChat Support .


Introducing DSSPro Chat System, your ultimate communication channel for your Unreal Engine projects! With a range of powerful features designed to enhance player interaction and safety, it's the perfect addition to any gaming project. Manage multiple Unreal Engine servers effortlessly, maintaining smooth communication across all platforms with support for both Linux and Windows hosting.


1. Multi-Language Support: Connect with players from around the globe in their native language.

2. Cross-Platform Compatibility: Seamlessly chat across different platforms, ensuring everyone stays connected.

3. Profanity Filter: Keep your gaming environment safe with a multi-language profanity filter, protecting players from harmful language.

4. Comprehensive Logging: Log all chat interactions to Elastic Search, allowing easy monitoring and resolution of complaints.

5. Diverse Channel Options: From Zone to Whisper, create and manage various channels tailored to your game's needs.

6. Easy Channel Creation: Generate new channels effortlessly with just one call, empowering you to customize communication.

7. Dynamic Events: Receive notifications when players subscribe or unsubscribe to channels, keeping your player in the loop.


This plugin is recommended for Dynamic Servers Sub-system (DSSLite)


Please note that the UI is included
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Multi language support
  • Cross Platform support
  •  Multi-language profanity filter (Keeps your players safe)
  •  Log chat to Elastic Search (in case of complaints, you can profile)
  • Zone, Level, World, Guild, Party, Whisper, Announcements, Notifications & Custom channels
  • Create as many channels as you want with one call (NewChannel1, NewChannel2)
  • OnPlayer subscribe/Unsubscribe to channel Events
  • Full API to control players (kick, subscribe, ban...) - To be Pushed in next update
  • On Other Players subscribed/Unsubscribe to your channel events
  • You have multiple Unreal Engine servers? not a problem at all :B
  • Blueprint & C++ support
  • Event based
  • Horizontally scalable (Whatever number of players you have, it scales)
  • Linux & Windows host support
  • Can be integrated with Windows Services/Systemd (OS Keeps track of your process including logs)


Code Modules:

  •  DCS (Runtime)


Number of Blueprints: 35

Number of C++ Classes: 4

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Linux, Android, IOS (not tested)
